title: Corpus Fund: An amount of minimum Rs 50,000/- per tenementor as directed by the HPC shall be created by the Promoter/Developer as a Corpus fund, which will be utilised for maintenance of the rehabilitation buildings for a period of 10 years
clause_text: Corpus Fund: An amount of minimum Rs 50,000/- per tenementor as directed by the HPC shall be created by the Promoter/Developer as a Corpus fund, which will be utilised for maintenance of the rehabilitation buildings for a period of 10 years.
